segment: I've loaded a number of games
to download his high school textbooks
but this screen is really good
the initial feel for this chromebook is superb
i had to spend over $ 160 to return it
you can play 2015 and below games on this computer
i didn't think i would use it but i definitely will in the future
unless the app is specifically designed to access google drive files
this is by far and away the worst computer i have ever purchased
